About Project: Escan Tower has 32 floors and four basement levels. This high-rise building consists of 397 complete residential properties that include studio, 1, 2 and 3-bed apartments. It is close to the interchange where Sheikh Zayed Road (E11) and Garn Al Sabkha Street (D59) meet.
